app_descript:
Univision NOW

Brief

Univision NOW brings the vibrant world of Hispanic television right into the palm of your hand. Tailored for those with a passion for Spanish-language entertainment, news, and sports, this dynamic app allows subscribers to enjoy the full spectrum of Univision content on-demand, anytime, anywhere. Dive into your favorite telenovelas or stay informed with the latest news bulletins‚Äîall with just a few taps.

Core Features üìå

  • On-Demand Entertainment: Revel in Univision's hit shows and telenovelas such as "True Loves" and "Simply Maria," as well as a selection of cherished classics. üì∫
  • Latest News Coverage: Keep abreast of the latest happenings with programs like "Univision Newspaper" and comprehensive local newscasts in select cities. üóûÔ∏è
  • Live Soccer Action: Get front-row access to premier football content, including Liga MX, UEFA, USMNT, and MNT matches, all live on your preferred devices. ‚öΩ
  • Multi-Device Access: With a single account, enjoy the convenience of watching across three devices, complete with rewind, pause, and replay features for shows broadcast in the past three days. üì±üíªüì∫
  • Flexible Subscription Plans: Experience Univision with free features or opt for enhanced access through the Univision Collection ($2.99/month) or Total Access plan ($7.99/month), with easy plan changes or cancellations. üí≥

Pros üëç

  • Binge-Worthy Content: An extensive library of programs that cater to a diverse range of viewing preferences. üòç
  • Real-Time Updates: Stay informed with current events and local news whenever you need to. üì∞
  • Sports Fanatics' Delight: Never miss a match with comprehensive coverage of your favorite football leagues. ü•Ö
  • Cross-Platform Streaming: Freedom to watch on different devices, ensuring you don't miss a moment. üîÅ
  • Trial Availability: Test out the service with a free trial before committing to a subscription. üÜì

Cons üëé

  • Geo-Restricted: Availability is limited to users within the US territory. üåé
  • Age-Restricted: Only accessible to individuals over the age of 18. üîû
  • Network Dependency: Requires at least a 3G network connection for optimal streaming quality. üì∂
  • Limited Program Access: Some content may be restricted or unavailable to certain users. üîí
  • Automatic Renewal: Subscriptions are auto-renewed, requiring users to cancel before the trial period ends to avoid charges. üí∏

Price üíµ

Univision NOW offers both free content and paid subscription plans. The Univision Collection is available for $2.99 per month, and the Total Access plan is priced at $7.99 per month. Users have the option to change or cancel their subscription plans with ease.

Please note that Univision NOW's service is exclusively available in the United States for users who are over 18 years old and requires at least a 3G network connection. Not all programs may be available, and automatic subscription charges may apply post-trial period unless canceled beforehand.
